title: Cannot build `mawk` with `clang` on Darwin
body:
When I build `mawk` with Apple's `clang` on Darwin 16.5.0 (macOS 10.12.4), then the resulting `mawk` executable always crashes.

A debugger shows the following:
```
$ lldb /Users/eschnett/src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-sierra-x86_64/clang-8.1.0-apple/mawk-1.3.4-7ktgundnge66kpkge2zyidmx5vq64mjg/bin/mawk
(lldb) target create "/Users/eschnett/src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-sierra-x86_64/clang-8.1.0-apple/mawk-1.3.4-7ktgundnge66kpkge2zyidmx5vq64mjg/bin/mawk"
Current executable set to '/Users/eschnett/src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-sierra-x86_64/clang-8.1.0-apple/mawk-1.3.4-7ktgundnge66kpkge2zyidmx5vq64mjg/bin/mawk' (x86_64).
(lldb) r
Process 16120 launched: '/Users/eschnett/src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-sierra-x86_64/clang-8.1.0-apple/mawk-1.3.4-7ktgundnge66kpkge2zyidmx5vq64mjg/bin/mawk' (x86_64)
2017-03-31 08:47:27.589547-0400 mawk[16120:5968363] detected buffer overflow
Process 16120 stopped
* thread #1, queue = 'com.apple.main-thread', stop reason = signal SIGABRT
    frame #0: 0x00007fffc6d74d42 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10
libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill:
->  0x7fffc6d74d42 <+10>: jae    0x7fffc6d74d4c            ; <+20>
    0x7fffc6d74d44 <+12>: movq   %rax, %rdi
    0x7fffc6d74d47 <+15>: jmp    0x7fffc6d6dcaf            ; cerror_nocancel
    0x7fffc6d74d4c <+20>: retq
(lldb)
```

Note the "detected buffer overflow" message.

I can build `mawk` just fine with a Spack-built `gcc`.
